fields.request: Validate nginx-setup.sh IPv6 toggle and removal workflow
fields.request_details: From a freshly configured node, run ./nginx-setup.sh --ip6 and confirm the rendered nginx config includes IPv6 listen directives without duplicating IPv4 entries. Afterwards execute ./nginx-setup.sh --remove to ensure all Arthexis nginx site configs are deleted and nginx -t && systemctl reload nginx succeed when the binary is available.
